definition: A subatomic particle that is electrically neutral and is commonly found in the nucleus of an atom. It is primarily utilized in scientific research, particularly in the field of nuclear physics, to study atomic structure, nuclear reactions, and various properties of matter.

examples.german: Das Neutron ist ein subatomares Teilchen.
examples.english: The neutron is a subatomic particle.

examples.german: Die Entdeckung des Neutrons erfolgte im Jahr 1932.
examples.english: The discovery of the neutron was made in 1932.
Neutrons are constituents of the atomic nucleus.

examples.german: Die Masse eines Neutrons beträgt etwa 1,675 × 10^-27 Kilogramm.
examples.english: The mass of a neutron is approximately 1.675 × 10^-27 kilograms.
